gov.nasa.arc.mct.gui
Class MenuExtensionManager

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.arc.mct.gui.MenuExtensionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuManager
public final class MenuExtensionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements MenuManager

Implements a manager of extended menu items. The singleton pattern is used to provide a single instance of the manager.

Method Summary

refreshExtendedMenus

public void refreshExtendedMenus(java.util.List<ExternalComponentRegistryImpl.ExtendedComponentProvider> providers)
Refreshes all extended menus by unregistering all extended menu actions and then reregistering all those actions from the given providers.

Parameters:
providers - the set of providers of extended menu actions

registerExtendedMenu

public void registerExtendedMenu(MenuItemInfo info)
Registers a new extended menu item.

Parameters:
